nodes.text: Bnar VII was an astronomical object located in the Bnar system, a part of the Braxant sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The decades-long career of the Noehon slaver Tir'uh saw her operate within an area of the galaxy spanning from Bnar VII, in the northern section of the galaxy, to Kessel, a planet in the galaxy's eastern portion. In 2 ABY, a Rebel Alliance Task Force on Alliance Security SecuriDex datafile on the Mytaranor Slaving Council, of which Tir'uh was a member, noted the possibility that the Noehon was familiar with every location between Bnar VII and Kessel that was related to the slaving business.

Bnar VII was mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Bnar system, and therefore Bnar VII, in grid square K-3.
